Text: The songs are all imaged and properly tagged and arranged in folders by episodes.....Be patient with this one....I don't have a very high speed connection...I will continue seeding till there are enough seeds...Hopefully this will happen soon enough....: - )

This torrent has errors and at least 2 files are incomplete. I have uploaded another torrent which is complete. Please use that one to get the complete collection. 

If you have already downloaded a part of this torrent, you can simply remove the torrent and keep the downloaded stuff in your download location. The new torrent will do a check and start from the point you have have completed. You will not need to download the stuff again.
